alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 9:26PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Muscogee, northeastern Chattahoochee and southern Harris Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 926 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Highland Park, or over Columbus, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, North Fort Benning, Bibb City, Upatoi, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Flat Rock, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Midland, Eelbeck/West Fort Benning, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park and Carter Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
